Crl.MC:7536/18 2 2019/KER/904
ORDER
When the matter was taken up, Sri. PK.Varghese, the learned
counsel appearing for the petitioner, requests that the matter be
dismissed as withdrawn without prejudice to his right to challenge
the final report. He also prays that Annexure-III affidavit sworn to by
the de facto complainant be returned. Reserving such right, this
application is dismissed as withdrawn.
Sd/-
RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN V.,
JUDGE
